title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘Her kids will have no inheritance’: Will my friend lose her house to Medicaid if she goes into a nursing home?
items.description: “She would like to leave her kids something after she dies.”

items.title: Broadcom is starting to look ‘eerily reminiscent’ of Nvidia. Both stocks are feeling the impact.
items.description: The company said it added a fourth customer for its custom chips. Some analysts now think the company’s AI revenue will double next year.

items.title: My friend and her second husband own property. How do her kids from her first marriage get their fair share?
items.description: “They are joint tenants with the right of survivorship.”

items.title: Here’s what Elon Musk must do to become a Tesla trillionaire
items.description: Tesla proposes a $1 trillion pay package for Elon Musk, if can stay focused on adding $7.5 trillion to the company’s value.
